text: *Issue: *`ctrl + v` (paste) doesn't work if you have active the revision tab open (and yes, I was focused on the code tab, but couldn't paste until I closed the revision history)

small feature tweak request.

The old design manager when you hit `cmd+f` would pull up the finder, you hit it again and it pulls up find and replace, hit it a third time and it would close it.

Iâ€™m not sure of any other editors that had that style of keyboard shortcut, but honestly. I felt it was really efficient and fell into a groove with it. I feel that only having `esc` kill the find/replace feature is a little unintuitive to me. I get the value in mimicing other tools though, perhaps having it as a togglable setting would be neat.
